title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag
name: SuperTag 超级标签
author: LinOnetwo

Auto generate input form on a tiddler by simply adding a SuperTag to it. Create a SuperTag by compositing existing TraitTags.

只需在条目上添加一个超级标签，就能自动生成输入表单。通过合成现有的特性标签来创建超级标签。

title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/switch-static-and-dynamic-page

# Allow you copy static page url using a view template button.

# 允许使用页面工具栏上的一个新按钮复制静态页面网址。
# 允许静态页面的浏览者使用卡片上的一个新按钮切换到动态页面。

name: Sitemap for server
author: Lin Onetwo

Generate Sitemap for your Nodejs based server.

Use this with your NodeJS based wiki server, or your [[blog served with TidGi|https://tidgi.fun/#TidGi%20Feature%20Handbook%2FBlogging%20With%20NAT%20Traversal]].

title: $:/plugins/Speff/typograms-tw5
name: typograms-tw5
author: Speff
description:
Wrapper for Google's Typograms.js - a javascript library which can render ASCII diagrams into simple diagrams. 

Typograms (typographic diagrams) is a lightweight image format (text/typogram) useful for defining simple diagrams in technical documentation. Typograms optimizes for editability and portability (e.g. plain text is easy to maintain, change, store and transmit), at the cost of expressivity (e.g. SVG is more expressive) and ergonomics (e.g. higher level tools produce diagrams faster).
